meanings.definition: A person who is not very intelligent or serious.
meanings.sent1: Some people think airheads are not good at solving problems.
meanings.sent2: The teacher was frustrated with the airheads in the class who never paid attention.
meanings.sent3: The group project was a disaster because all the airheads kept forgetting their tasks.
meanings.sent4: In the movie, the villain was portrayed as an airhead who constantly made foolish decisions.
meanings.sent5: The comedy show always has a character who plays the role of an airhead for laughs.

meanings.definition: A type of candy made of sugar and flavoring that is light and fluffy.
meanings.sent1: During Halloween, kids love to eat airheads because of their fruity flavors.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of candies, but the airheads were the most popular among children.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the guests enjoyed the airheads as a sweet treat.
meanings.sent4: The airheads melted in the sun, creating a sticky mess on the picnic table.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packaging of airheads always catches the eye of shoppers in the candy aisle.
